# weatheR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of weatheR is to provide functions that help analyzing and visualizing
weather and climatic data. Included functionnalities are:

- Calculation of growing degree-days.  
- Comparison of weather to climate.
